Html:
I was receiving an error like this when calling the Convert-SqlServerInventoryClixmlToExcel

Exception calling "Add" with "0" argument(s): "Old format or invalid type library. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80028018
(TYPE_E_INVDATAREAD))"

It turned out to be an issue with the locale of the system - I was using non-US regional settings so once that was changed to English (United States) the script worked.

Did you have to change the entire OS locale to English in order for it to work properly? Or was this a setting that you made elsewhere?

--Kendal

Hi Kendal,
Just had to change the Formats in Regional Settings. The Windows Locale/Location was English.

//ivan
